plot: I remember is the story of Eddie Ross' journey from Poland to UK; from escaping the Nazis and Holocaust to fight for the British army. The expense of freedom was losing his Jewish roots.
title: I remember
plot_es: I remember is the story of Eddie Ross' journey from Poland to UK; from escaping the Nazis and Holocaust to fight for the British army. The expense of freedom was losing his Jewish roots.
plot_en: I remember is the story of Eddie Ross' journey from Poland to UK; from escaping the Nazis and Holocaust to fight for the British army. The expense of freedom was losing his Jewish roots.
